verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> And it came to pass the same year הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> the same בְּרֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> in the beginning מַמְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH4467> of the reign צִדְקִיָּ֣ה <WH6667> of Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah [בִּשְׁנַת כ] (בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year ק) הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <WH7243> in the fourth בַּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֑י <WH2549> [and] in the fifth אָמַ֣ר <WH559> spake אֵלַ֡י <WH413> about חֲנַנְיָה֩ <WH2608> [that] Hananiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עַזּ֨וּר <WH5809> of Azur הַנָּבִ֜יא <WH5030> the prophet אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who מִגִּבְעוֹן֙ <WH1391> which [was] of Gibeon בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto me in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְעֵינֵ֧י <WH5869> in the presence הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> of the priests וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and of all the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying שָׁבַ֞רְתִּי <WH7665> I have broken אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֖ל <WH5923> the yoke מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> Within שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <WH8141> years יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> Within two full אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am מֵשִׁיב֙ <WH7725> will I bring again אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> into this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> all the vessels בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which לָקַ֜ח <WH3947> took away נְבוּכַדנֶאצַּ֤ר <WH5019> that Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> from this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <WH935> and carried בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> them to Babylon

וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְכָנְיָ֣ה <WH3204> Jeconiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְ֠הוּדָה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH854> for כָּל־ <WH3605> and all גָּל֨וּת <WH1546> with all the captives יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבָּאִ֣ים <WH935> that went בָּבֶ֗לָה <WH894> into Babylon אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am מֵשִׁ֛יב <WH7725> And I will bring again אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> to this place הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> to this נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֶשְׁבֹּ֔ר <WH7665> for I will break אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֖ל <WH5923> the yoke מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֣ה <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> Then the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> about חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <WH2608> Hananiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> unto the prophet לְעֵינֵ֤י <WH5869> in the presence הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests וּלְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> and in the presence כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of all the people הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> that stood בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֣ה <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> Even the prophet אָמֵ֕ן <WH543> Amen כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> do יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God יָקֵ֤ם <WH6965> perform יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <WH1697> thy words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִבֵּ֗אתָ <WH5012> which thou hast prophesied לְהָשִׁ֞יב <WH7725> to bring again כְּלֵ֤י <WH3627> the vessels בֵית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> and all that is carried away captive מִבָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> from Babylon אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this אַךְ־ <WH389> also שְׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> listen

נָא֙ <WH4994> now הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thou now this word הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I דֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that I speak בְּאָזְנֶ֑יךָ <WH241> in thine ears וּבְאָזְנֵ֖י <WH241> and in the ears כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of all the people

הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <WH5030> The prophets אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הָי֧וּ <WH1961> become לְפָנַ֛י <WH6440> that have been before וּלְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> me and before מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> thee of old וַיִּנָּ֨בְא֜וּ <WH5012> prophesied אֶל־ <WH413> against אֲרָצ֤וֹת <WH776> countries רַבּוֹת֙ <WH7227> both against many וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against מַמְלָכ֣וֹת <WH4467> kingdoms גְּדֹל֔וֹת <WH1419> and against great לְמִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war וּלְרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> and of evil וּלְדָֽבֶר׃ <WH1698> and of pestilence

הַנָּבִ֕יא <WH5030> The prophet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> which prophesieth לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> of peace בְּבֹא֙ <WH935> shall come to pass דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> when the word הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> of the prophet יִוָּדַע֙ <WH3045> be known הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> shall the prophet אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שְׁלָח֥וֹ <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD בֶּאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> hath truly

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> took חֲנַנְיָ֤ה <WH2608> Then Hananiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet אֶת־ <WH853> הַמּוֹטָ֔ה <WH4133> the yoke מֵעַ֕ל <WH5921> from צַוַּ֖אר <WH6677> neck יִרְמְיָ֣ה <WH3414> Jeremiah's הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> from off the prophet וַֽיִּשְׁבְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7665> and brake

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake חֲנַנְיָה֩ <WH2608> And Hananiah לְעֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> in the presence כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> of all the people לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּה֮ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> Even אֶשְׁבֹּ֞ר <WH7665> Even so will I break אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֣ל ׀ <WH5923> the yoke נְבֻֽכַדְנֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon בְּעוֹד֙ <WH5750> within שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <WH8141> years יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> within the space of two full מֵעַ֕ל <WH5921> from צַוַּ֖אר <WH6677> from the neck כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of all nations וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <WH1980> went יִרְמְיָ֥ה <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> And the prophet לְדַרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> his way פ

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֑ה <WH3414> came unto Jeremiah אַ֠חֲרֵי <WH310> [the prophet] after שְׁב֞וֹר <WH7665> had broken חֲנַנְיָ֤ה <WH2608> that Hananiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet אֶת־ <WH853> הַמּוֹטָ֔ה <WH4133> the yoke מֵעַ֗ל <WH5921> off צַוַּ֛אר <WH6677> from off the neck יִרְמְיָ֥ה <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> of the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָלוֹךְ֩ <WH1980> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> and tell אֶל־ <WH413> to חֲנַנְיָ֜ה <WH2608> Hananiah לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD מוֹטֹ֥ת <WH4133> the yokes עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> of wood שָׁבָ֑רְתָּ <WH7665> Thou hast broken וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> but thou shalt make תַחְתֵּיהֶ֖ן <WH8478> instead מֹט֥וֹת <WH4133> for them yokes בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> of iron

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel עֹ֣ל <WH5923> a yoke בַּרְזֶ֡ל <WH1270> of iron נָתַ֜תִּי <WH5414> I have put עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוַּ֣אר ׀ <WH6677> upon the neck כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> of all these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these לַעֲבֹ֛ד <WH5647> that they may serve אֶת־ <WH853> נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וַעֲבָדֻ֑הוּ <WH5647> and they shall serve וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> have also אֶת־ <WH853> חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> him the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> him and I have given לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said יִרְמְיָ֧ה <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֛יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to חֲנַנְיָ֥ה <WH2608> unto Hananiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet שְׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֣א <WH4994> now חֲנַנְיָ֑ה <WH2608> now Hananiah לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not שְׁלָחֲךָ֣ <WH7971> hath not sent יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you הִבְטַ֛חְתָּ <WH982> to trust אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> thee but thou makest this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> in שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> in a lie

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> I am about מְשַֽׁלֵּֽחֲךָ֔ <WH7971> Behold I will cast מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> thee from off the face הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the earth הַשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> this year אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מֵ֔ת <WH4191> thou shalt die כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because סָרָ֥ה <WH5627> rebellion דִבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> because thou hast taught אֶל־ <WH413> against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> against the LORD

וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> died חֲנַנְיָ֥ה <WH2608> So Hananiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> the same year הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> the same בַּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> in the seventh פ
